basics.name: Matt Nemitz
basics.summary: Software Engineer, frontend specialist, enthusiastic generalist.

work.summary: As part of the DevX team, I build tools and services to optimise developer experience for Speechmatics customers.
highlights: Led development of the [Speechmatics JS SDK](https://github.com/speechmatics/speechmatics-js-sdk), a set of tools for developing speech-powered applications on all JS platforms.
Built large features for the [Speechmatics Portal](https://portal.speechmatics.com), a web application for managing Speechmatics accounts and projects.

work.summary: On the Velocity team at Habito, I undertook projects to streamline developer tooling within the company.
highlights: Built tools for automatically generating REST APIs and clients in Typescript from [Smithy](https://smithy.io/) and [OpenAPI](https://www.openapis.org/) definitions.

work.summary: I worked on the mobile app and backend for Crisp, a fully online supermarket serving the Netherlands and Belgium.
highlights: Built several UI features in React Native, including allowing users to add products to a pending order in a single tap.
